org.eclipse.scada.configuration.world.osgi

Interface ScriptTimer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScriptTimerImpl

    public interface ScriptTimer
    A representation of the model object 'Script Timer'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Script
    • Period

    See Also:
    OsgiPackage.getScriptTimer()
